mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, M.NAME, M.N_NAME, M.B_DATE, M.GENDER, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.POINT, MR.ROLENUM, R.ROLENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON (M.ID=MR.ID) INNER JOIN ROLE R ON (MR.ROLENUM=R.ROLENUM) WHERE M.ID=#{id} AND M.PW=#{pw} ORDER BY R.ROLENUM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ROLE(R_NUM, ROLENUM, ID) VALUES(MEMBER_ROLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 3, #{id})
INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PW, NAME, N_NAME, B_DATE, GENDER, EMAIL, PHONE, POINT) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{n_name}, #{b_date}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET N_NAME=#{n_name}, GENDER=#{gender}, EMAIL=#{email}, PHONE=#{phone} WHERE ID=#{id}
